001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.tn3270;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
010import java.io.BufferedWriter;
011import java.io.IOException;
012import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
013import java.nio.channels.FileChannel;
014import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
015import java.nio.file.Files;
016import java.nio.file.Path;
017import java.nio.file.StandardOpenOption;
018import java.time.Instant;
019import java.time.ZoneId;
020import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
021
022/**
023 * Writes TN3270 message events into blob/index files compatible with the HTTP sink.
024 * <p>Synchronized to maintain blob/index consistency and optionally delegates non-TN3270 pairs to
025 * another {@link PersistencePort}.
026 *
027 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
028 */
029public final class Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter implements PersistencePort {
030  private static final DateTimeFormatter STAMP =
031      DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern("uuuuMMdd-HHmmss").withZone(ZoneId.systemDefault());
032
033  private final FileChannel blob;
034  private final BufferedWriter index;
035  private final String blobName;
036  private final String indexName;
037  private final PersistencePort fallback;
038
039  /**
040   * Creates a TN3270 segment sink without a fallback.
041   *
042   * @param directory output directory for blob/index files
043   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code directory} is {@code null}
044   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
045   */  public Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory) {
046    this(directory, null);
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Creates a TN3270 segment sink with an optional fallback.
051   *
052   * @param directory output directory for blob/index files
053   * @param fallback optional persistence fallback for other protocols
054   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code directory} is {@code null}
055   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
056   */  public Tn3270SegmentSinkPersistenceAdapter(Path directory, PersistencePort fallback) {
057    try {
058      Files.createDirectories(directory);
059      String stamp = STAMP.format(Instant.now());
060      this.blobName = "blob-tn-" + stamp + ".seg";
061      this.indexName = "index-tn-" + stamp + ".ndjson";
062      this.blob =
063          FileChannel.open(
064              directory.resolve(blobName),
065              StandardOpenOption.CREATE,
066              StandardOpenOption.WRITE,
067              StandardOpenOption.READ);
068      this.blob.position(blob.size());
069      this.index =
070          Files.newBufferedWriter(
071              directory.resolve(indexName), StandardCharsets.UTF_8, StandardOpenOption.CREATE, StandardOpenOption.APPEND);
072      this.fallback = fallback;
073    } catch (IOException e) {
074      throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to initialize TN3270 segment sink", e);
075    }
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Writes TN3270 payloads to disk, delegating other protocols to the fallback.
080   *
081   * @param pair message pair to persist; {@code null} is ignored
082   * @throws Exception if writing fails or the fallback throws
083   * @implNote Flushes blob/index metadata each call to mirror historical sink semantics.
084   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
085   */  @Override
086  public synchronized void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception {
087    if (pair == null) {
088      return;
089    }
090    boolean handled = false;
091    if (isTn(pair.request())) {
092      writeEvent(pair.request(), "REQ");
093      handled = true;
094    }
095    if (isTn(pair.response())) {
096      writeEvent(pair.response(), "RSP");
097      handled = true;
098    }
099    if (!handled && fallback != null) {
100      fallback.persist(pair);
101    }
102  }
103
104  private boolean isTn(MessageEvent event) {
105    return event != null && event.protocol() == ProtocolId.TN3270 && event.payload() != null;
106  }
107
108  private void writeEvent(MessageEvent event, String kind) throws Exception {
109    ByteStream stream = event.payload();
110    byte[] data = stream.data();
111    FiveTuple flow = stream.flow();
112    String src = endpoint(flow, stream.fromClient());
113    String dst = endpoint(flow, !stream.fromClient());
114
115    String id = event.metadata() != null ? event.metadata().transactionId() : null;
116    if (id == null || id.isBlank()) {
117      id = TransactionId.newId();
118    }
119
120    long bodyOff = blob.position();
121    if (data.length > 0) {
122      blob.write(ByteBuffer.wrap(data));
123    }
124    long bodyLen = blob.position() - bodyOff;
125
126    String firstLine = preview(data);
127    String json =
128        new StringBuilder(256)
129            .append('{')
130            .append("\"ts_first\":").append(stream.timestampMicros())
131            .append(",\"ts_last\":").append(stream.timestampMicros())
132            .append(",\"id\":\"").append(escape(id)).append('\"')
133            .append(",\"kind\":\"").append(kind).append('\"')
134            .append(",\"src\":\"").append(escape(src)).append('\"')
135            .append(",\"dst\":\"").append(escape(dst)).append('\"')
136            .append(",\"first_line\":\"").append(escape(firstLine)).append('\"')
137            .append(",\"headers_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append('\"')
138            .append(",\"headers_off\":").append(bodyOff)
139            .append(",\"headers_len\":0")
140            .append(",\"body_blob\":\"").append(blobName).append('\"')
141            .append(",\"body_off\":").append(bodyOff)
142            .append(",\"body_len\":").append(bodyLen)
143            .append('}')
144            .toString();
145
146    index.write(json);
147    index.newLine();
148    index.flush();
149    blob.force(false);
150  }
151
152  private static String endpoint(FiveTuple flow, boolean fromClient) {
153    return fromClient ? flow.srcIp() + ":" + flow.srcPort() : flow.dstIp() + ":" + flow.dstPort();
154  }
155
156  private static String preview(byte[] data) {
157    if (data == null || data.length == 0) {
158      return "TN3270";
159    }
160    int len = Math.min(data.length, 16);
161    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder(len * 2);
162    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
163      int b = data[i] & 0xFF;
164      sb.append(Character.forDigit((b >>> 4) & 0xF, 16));
165      sb.append(Character.forDigit(b & 0xF, 16));
166    }
167    if (data.length > len) {
168      sb.append("...");
169    }
170    return sb.toString();
171  }
172
173  private static String escape(String value) {
174    StringBuilder b = new StringBuilder(value.length() + 16);
175    for (int i = 0; i < value.length(); i++) {
176      char c = value.charAt(i);
177      switch (c) {
178        case '"', '\\' -> b.append('\\').append(c);
179        case '\n' -> b.append("\\n");
180        case '\r' -> b.append("\\r");
181        case '\t' -> b.append("\\t");
182        default -> {
183          if (c < 0x20) {
184            b.append(' ');
185          } else {
186            b.append(c);
187          }
188        }
189      }
190    }
191    return b.toString();
192  }
193
194  /**
195   * Flushes and closes blob/index streams and the fallback sink.
196   *
197   * @throws Exception if closing the fallback fails
198   * @implNote Forces blob metadata to disk before invoking the fallback close.
199   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
200   */  @Override
201  public synchronized void close() throws Exception {
202    try {
203      index.flush();
204    } finally {
205      try {
206        index.close();
207      } finally {
208        blob.force(true);
209        blob.close();
210        if (fallback != null) {
211          fallback.close();
212        }
213      }
214    }
215  }
216}
217
